Here is a report about the Titanic

```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE,
                      warning = FALSE,
                      message = FALSE)
```

## Data visualization

Compare fare and passenger age.

```{r load data}
titanic_data <- read.csv("../data/titanic.csv")
```

``` {r scatter-plot}
ggplot(titanic_data, aes(x = age, y = fare)) +
    geom_point()
```
